channel.title: Type in' Close
channel.description: When someone types something on my server and presses enter, the server x's out. I'm using 317 server, so please help moparscape m8s. :)

item.title: Type in' Close
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:4, topic:362276”][quote author=arham 4 link=topic=458563.msg3355530#msg3355530 date=1285797233]

Do you mean the client disconnects or the server actually stops?

Also, by stops do you mean the server actually exits, or it stops accepting connections?

You know the red x button, it automatically closes. So yeah, acually exits.
[/quote]
What revision? 317 or 508… etc.[/quote]
I said in my post, 317.

Read full topic
